data.message: I love you more than you know...must be nice that you can get some kind of idea what that is. Do you like Bam Margera and Jimmy Kimmel? I do...I will maybe go on the Kimmel show to let people know that I'm a real person. I no longer am called Katdogg. Im glad though. I want Ice Cube to be my good friend. I don't need cops bothering me about music I listen to. They have their descrepencies being done by me. I report in to the White House and I earned my title Kingston Loyal. Its a good name. I hope you like Steve-O, I know God appreciates him and you too.
